titulo: Estudio de mercado de importacion
descripcion: üîç CONTRATACI√ìN de freelancer para estudio de mercado **objetivo:** identificar oportunidades concretas de importaci√≥n rentable para abastecer a empresas y prestadores de servicios en **vaca muerta (argentina)**, validando demanda, productos clave y socios comerciales estrat√©gicos. --- ### üìò **1. alcance del proyecto** el freelancer deber√°: a. **Identificar oportunidades en Vaca Muerta** - Detectar productos con demanda insatisfecha (insumos, maquinarias, piezas, tecnolog√≠a, etc.). - Definir **propuestas de valor concretas** y diferenciadoras. - Construir una **lista de productos clave** para importar. B. **Validar la demanda comercial** - Coordinar y realizar **entrevistas con al menos 15 empresas operativas en Vaca Muerta** (prestadores de servicios, contratistas, operadores). - Levantar informaci√≥n sobre necesidades, falencias del mercado actual, proveedores actuales, tiempos, costos y calidad. - Identificar **early adopters potenciales** y su predisposici√≥n a comprar. C. **Definir MVP e indicadores econ√≥micos** - Definir un MVP (1 a 3 productos espec√≠ficos) con: - Precio estimado. - Volumen m√≠nimo viable. - Condiciones de compra/venta. - Estimar la **unidad econ√≥mica b√°sica**: m√°rgenes, costos log√≠sticos e impositivos, capital de trabajo inicial. - requisitos regulatorios exigibles y habilitaciones d. **Mapeo de socios estrat√©gicos** - Construir un **mapa de actores clave**: - Distribuidores zonales. - Corredores. - Proveedores log√≠sticos. - Despachantes de aduana y agentes de carga. - Identificar **potenciales socios comerciales** para esquema de consignaci√≥n o dep√≥sito. E. **Segmentaci√≥n del mercado** - Identificar los distintos perfiles de clientes por rubro, tama√±o, facturaci√≥n, tipo de necesidad y proceso de compra. F. **Validaci√≥n con encuestas** - Dise√±ar y aplicar una **encuesta simple y concreta** a un m√≠nimo de 15 empresas en la regi√≥n Conocimientos valorados: Investigaci√≥n de Mercado, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project

titulo: Seeking Expert to Develop Comprehensive Business Plan for Online Therapy Platform in Argentina
descripcion: Project Overview: We need a skilled professional to create a detailed business plan that outlines our vision, market strategy, operational plan, financial projections, and the competitive landscape within the Argentinian market. This document will serve as our roadmap for launching and scaling the platform, as well as a tool to attract investors and partners. Scope of Work: - Conducting a market analysis to understand the demand for online therapy in Argentina, including identifying our target market and analyzing competitor strategies. - Developing a marketing and sales strategy that outlines how we will attract both therapists and users to our platform. - Outlining the operational workflow, including therapist vetting processes, user-therapist matching algorithms, and post-session feedback mechanisms. - Creating financial projections for the first 3-5 years, including startup costs, revenue streams, and a break-even analysis. - Providing recommendations for legal and regulatory compliance specific to the Argentinian health tech sector. Ideal Candidate: - Has experience in business planning for startups, preferably in the health tech or online platform sectors. - Possesses a deep understanding of the Argentinian market and regulatory environment. - Demonstrates expertise in market analysis, financial modeling, and strategic planning. - Is able to present complex information in a clear, concise, and actionable manner. Project Timeline: We are looking to complete the business plan within 6-8 weeks from the project start date. Budget: Please provide a detailed quote based on the scope of work outlined above. We are open to negotiation based on experience and the value you can bring to our project. If you are interested in this project, please submit a proposal outlining your experience, approach to the project, and any initial thoughts or questions you might have. Also, include examples of similar projects you've completed and references we can contact. We are excited to work with a professional who shares our vision of transforming mental health care in Argentina. Thank you for considering our project. Conocimientos valorados: Investigaci√≥n de Mercado, Redacci√≥n Comercial, Marketing Online, Marketing, Asistente de administr..., Investigaci√≥n, An√°lisis de Negocios, An√°lisis Financiero, Estad√≠stica, Planificaci√≥n Estrat√©gica
